name: blast bros ii
description:
blast bros ii

by @pattheflip

knock your opponent offscreen to take their life. take damage and you'll get pushed farther. hold down your shoot button to get a stronger shot or a shield.

oh yeah, small shots also inherit your y movement. heh.

P1
W - up
AD - left/right
space - shoot

P2
P - up
L' - left/right
enter - shoot
